data.title: AHMAD RIAZUDDIN - Technical Advisor (CSG APAC-EMEA) - Rotork Controls
data.meta_description: AHMAD RIAZUDDIN, Chennai Berufserfahrung, Kontaktdaten, Portfolio und weitere Infos: Erfahr mehr â€“ oder kontaktier AHMAD RIAZUDDIN direkt bei XING.
data.text: I'm a highly accomplished and adept technical advisor with extensive expertise in product management, ideation, industrialization, and implementation. I've successfully executed numerous complex projects, overseeing New Product Gerber and Manufacturing Reviews, benchmarking Suppliers, validating Prototypes, qualifying Pilot Builds, and implementing Product Lifecycle Management. I possess exceptional technical and techno-commercial skills, mentored many junior co-workers, and had led diverse multi-disciplinary teams to achieve project goals. I had demonstrated exemplary leadership and direction, fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting Client Relationships. I possess strong analytical abilities, effectively navigating complex and contradictory information to solve problems and align business insight with organizational objectives, ensuring accountability. I'm renowned for exceptional planning, alignment, and interpersonal acumen, leaving a lasting impact at each position held.
